data.message: Facebook, please, for the love of God, make a better security system for Facebook users. I'm always seeing my friends getting hacked and people getting tagged in spam messages with malware, spyware and virus links. And quite frankly, I'm really sick and tired of seeing this and getting spam messages on my wall.

replies.message: Hi Tom. We're constantly trying to improve the Facebook experience, and we'll let our team know about your feedback. In the meantime, if your friend can't get into their account because it was taken over by someone else, please tell them to go to the Hacked Accounts section of the Help Center to get immediate help. Thanks! -Ryan

help hacked account is no good if you cant access your old email account because the directions  are no help at all when  all they say is  we will send a new pass word to your e mail address ,or they tell you to use your security question but gives you ZERO option to access those questions either to answer it  or even see it....

WHAT HAPPENED?  All of the sudden when using my android phone, I can no longer share to my own timeline. I also can't access my homepage to update my status.  I have no search field to search for other pages.  Basically my android phone will now only allow me to view or reply to notifications. I need access to my own home page, I need to make updates, I need to search, and I need to share... at least to my own homepage.  Also if I make any errors, it will no longer allow me to go in and edit my post from my phone.
